meanings.sent1: Lack of rain impoverishes the soil.
meanings.sent2: The economic crisis impoverishes many families.
meanings.sent3: Eating only candy for dinner impoverishes your health.
meanings.sent4: The constant theft of resources impoverishes the land.
meanings.sent5: The war's aftermath impoverishes the once thriving city.

meanings.definition: Diminish the quality or value of.
meanings.sent1: Using cheap materials impoverishes the product.
meanings.sent2: The graffiti on the historic building impoverishes its beauty.
meanings.sent3: Adding too much salt to the dish impoverishes its taste.
meanings.sent4: The lack of maintenance impoverishes the car's performance.
meanings.sent5: The negative comments online impoverish the reputation of the company.
